statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE classroom_id = 1;
SELECT classroom_name, instructor_name FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE schedule_datetime > '2022-06-01';
SELECT classroom_name FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE instructor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms ORDER BY schedule_datetime DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM virtual_classrooms;
SELECT classroom_name, instructor_name FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE schedule_datetime > NOW() ORDER BY schedule_datetime DESC
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY schedule_datetime ASC
SELECT classroom_name AS room, DATE(schedule_datetime) AS date FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE instructor_name IN ('Jane Smith', 'Adam Johnson')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_classes FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE schedule_datetime BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-11-01'
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM virtual_classrooms ORDER BY instructor_name
SELECT * FROM classrooms;
SELECT classroom_name, instructor_name FROM classrooms;
SELECT * FROM discussions WHERE discussion_topic = 'Mathematics';
SELECT discussion_date, discussion_topic FROM discussions ORDER BY discussion_date DESC;
SELECT classroom_id, instructor_name FROM classrooms WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM classrooms WHERE classroom_name='Math Class';
SELECT instructor_name, classroom_name FROM classrooms WHERE instructor_name='John Doe';
SELECT discussion_topic FROM discussions WHERE discussion_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM discussions WHERE discussion_topic LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT classroom_name, schedule FROM classrooms JOIN discussions ON classrooms.classroom_id = discussions.classroom_id;
SELECT * FROM VirtualClassroom;
SELECT classroom_id, class_name, teacher_id FROM VirtualClassroom WHERE capacity > 20;
SELECT * FROM Webinar ORDER BY webinar_date DESC;
SELECT discussion_topic, discussion_date FROM OnlineDiscussion WHERE participant_count < 10;
SELECT speaker_id, MAX(max_participants) AS max_participants FROM Webinar GROUP BY speaker_id;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM VirtualClassroom;
SELECT * FROM Webinar WHERE max_participants > 50;
SELECT discussion_topic, moderator_id FROM OnlineDiscussion ORDER BY discussion_date DESC;
SELECT webinar_topic, speaker_id FROM Webinar WHERE webinar_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM VirtualClassroom WHERE capacity BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY class_schedule ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms;
SELECT id, classroom_name FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE moderator_id = 1;
SELECT id, webinar_title, start_time, end_time FROM webinars ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT topic, discussion_date FROM online_discussions WHERE host_id = 2;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_type = 'student';
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms ORDER BY schedule_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT webinar_title, start_time, end_time FROM webinars WHERE speaker_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT id, topic FROM online_discussions WHERE discussion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_type = 'student';
SELECT classroom_name, moderator_id FROM virtual_classrooms JOIN participants ON virtual_classrooms.moderator_id = participants.id ORDER BY classroom_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms ORDER BY classroom_name DESC;
SELECT classroom_id, instructor_id FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT classroom_name, instructor_id, start_time, end_time FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM webinars WHERE scheduled_date = '2022-05-15' AND end_time < '18:00:00';
SELECT discussion_id, topic FROM online_discussions WHERE discussion_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY topic ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms ORDER BY classroom_name DESC;
SELECT classroom_name, instructor_id FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_name, email FROM instructors INNER JOIN virtual_classrooms ON instructors.instructor_id = virtual_classrooms.instructor_id;
SELECT classroom_id, classroom_name, instructor_name FROM virtual_classrooms LEFT JOIN instructors ON virtual_classrooms.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT student_name, enrolled_courses FROM students WHERE enrolled_courses LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
